name: Deep Sea Sweep demo
description:
Clean the ocean floor from all those filthy treasure chests lying around.  

Controls :  arrow keys/wasd to move, space to pick up or drop the chest, and dash when you aren't carrying anything. Use space on the map to select a level and progress to the next.

Use mouse for menus.

For this demo, all levels are unlocked by default so you can just try them out as you like.

The soundtrack I made can be found here : https://soundcloud.com/user-822394732/tracks

Additional graphics by OriHope and Adrien Danizel.
